A handful of flagship builds leading the roadmap.

Abschlusspullis Abschluss-Pullover

Led the front-end development lifecycle from initial UI/UX design concepts to the live production shop. My role included designing a custom Shopware theme, developing reusable components, and integrating multiple plugins to enhance user experience and backend functionality. Collaborated closely with the backend and design teams to align brand identity with technical performance.

  • Shopware 6
  • JavaScript
  • Html & scss
  • Bootstrap
  • UI/UX

GLS Konto Eröffnung

Led the technical development of a secure digital registration system enabling new customer data submission and processing. I collaborated with business analysts, API teams, and designers to ensure a seamless user experience and regulatory compliance. My responsibilities spanned from defining the registration workflow, integrating with financial systems, to developing a custom back-office for internal management.

  • PHP
  • Symfony
  • JavaScript
  • HTML & CSS
  • Cypress
  • MySQL
  • Jenkins

Brichbag

Senior Full-Stack Developer & E-Commerce Consultant — Brichbag Online Shop (brichbag.de) At Brichbag, a premium fashion and accessories e-commerce platform, I contributed as both a technical consultant and reviewer to elevate the design, architecture, and performance of the shop. My responsibilities spanned UX/UI evaluation, plugin architecture design, and technical recommendations that supported scalability, maintainability, and a seamless customer experience.

  • Shopware 6
  • PHP
  • Plugins Development
  • JavaScript
  • HTML & CSS
  • UI/UX

Bruno Banani

I worked across the full front-end lifecycle — from conceptual design to live deployment — to deliver a high-end, responsive e-commerce experience aligned with Bruno Banani’s brand identity. This included creating the visual design, building a bespoke Shopware theme, developing custom plugins, and optimizing performance and usability for both desktop and mobile platforms.

  • Shopware 6
  • PHP
  • JavaScript
  • Html & SCSS

Original Räder 24

Led the end-to-end front-end development of the OR24 online store — from conceptual UI/UX design to the live, production-ready site. My work focused on delivering a professional and performance-driven platform where customers can easily browse and configure OEM wheels and car accessories. I also participated in developing custom Shopware plugins and performance enhancements to ensure a smooth user experience across all devices.

  • Shopware 6
  • JavaScript
  • PHP
  • HTML & SCSS
  • UI/UX

Tee-mass

Oversaw the end-to-end front-end development of Tee-Mass’s e-commerce platform — from visual design to go-live. My work focused on crafting a clean, elegant, and user-friendly interface that aligned with the brand’s artisanal and natural identity. I also contributed to plugin development, feature optimization, and front-end performance tuning to enhance the overall shopping experience.

  • Shopware 6
  • PHP
  • JavaScript
  • HTML & SCSS
  • UI/UX
